title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 405.2 - Authorization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 405.2 - Authorization

State Regulations
(a) With the
exception of child care services, the social services district shall use form
DSS-638, or an approved local equivalent, for authorizing the purchase of
services and shall comply with all applicable requirements of section
404.7
of this Title. (b) Child care services shall be authorized
on the DSS-2970, or the DSS-3209, according to guidelines established by the

Office of Children and Family Services, or an approved local
equivalent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
405.2

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
